project.name: My Frontend Project
project.description: A React-based web application with multiple landing pages. The main hero images are located in public/assets/images/ and the internationalization files are in src/i18n/

events.name: Halloween 2024
events.description: Transform the website with spooky Halloween theme. Add pumpkins, ghosts, and autumn colors. Make it fun and festive but not too scary.

events.name: Christmas 2024
events.description: Add festive Christmas decorations. Include snowflakes, Santa themes, winter colors (red, green, white). Keep it joyful and family-friendly.

events.name: New Year 2025
events.description: Celebrate the new year with fireworks, champagne glasses, and '2025' decorations. Use gold, silver, and sparkle effects.
